title: Implement robust auth form validation and feedback states
description: Auth forms do not clearly communicate invalid input or in-progress submission. Add inline validation, form-level API error handling, and loading/disabled submit states.
acceptance_criteria: Invalid fields show clear inline errors; failed auth attempts show visible feedback; submit buttons reflect loading and disabled states correctly; no console errors during interactions.

title: Location search: validation and empty states
description: Add basic validation for location input/radius and show helpful empty/error states when no results or invalid input.

title: Events: wire location search params
description: On /events, read location + radius query params from the search bar and display the active filter state (e.g., 'within 50 miles of Boise, ID').

title: Fix low contrast labels and metadata on events venues services and map
description: Small labels and muted metadata text are hard to read against dark surfaces. Adjust color tokens and component styles to meet readability and accessibility expectations.
acceptance_criteria: Metadata labels placeholders and auxiliary text meet contrast goals; readability improves on all core pages; no brand style regressions in high emphasis text.

title: Homepage: add subtle background shift between sections
description: Add a subtle background shift between the hero section and the next content area on the homepage. Use a gentle dark gradient or overlay to improve section separation.

title: Synchronize map markers and listing selection behavior
description: Map and listing panes currently feel disconnected. Implement two way sync so selecting a marker highlights the matching list item and selecting a list item highlights or pans to the marker.
acceptance_criteria: Marker click updates list selection; list click updates map focus and marker state; active item styling is obvious in both panes; behavior works on desktop and mobile.

title: Implement venue detail page with full venue data rendering
description: Implement venue detail UI that renders all available venue fields from current data model. Include address location context contact and website information when present.
acceptance_criteria: Venue detail route renders complete venue information from source data; optional fields degrade gracefully; actions and metadata are clearly organized and readable.

title: Normalize venue and service data formatting and missing field behavior
description: Directory cards show inconsistent formatting for addresses phones and website actions. Implement standardized formatting and graceful display when fields are missing.
acceptance_criteria: Phone address and website data follow consistent formatting rules; missing values show clear fallback treatment; no broken links or malformed rows appear.

title: Implement browse controls for events venues and services pages
description: Add production grade browsing controls to core list pages so users can find content quickly. Include search filters sort and pagination or infinite loading on Events Venues and Services pages.
acceptance_criteria: Events Venues and Services each support search filters sort and paginated loading; controls are responsive and keyboard accessible; loading empty and error states are clear.

title: Sprint 5 admin, maps & SEO
description: Build admin review/approval flows, Mapbox map/search surfaces, and SEO enhancements (Event schema, metadata, sitemap). Validate UI with DevTools.

title: Add terms and privacy consent cue to create account submit area
description: Create Account flow should include concise consent context near submit. Add legal acknowledgment copy with links to Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
acceptance_criteria: Create Account includes visible consent text near submit; Terms and Privacy links are functional and accessible; copy remains legible across breakpoints.

title: Reduce mobile pre-form scroll on auth pages
description: Mobile auth pages require too much scrolling before users reach form controls. Compress top-of-page spacing to prioritize task completion while preserving brand context.
acceptance_criteria: On mobile, the first auth form appears earlier with less initial scrolling; layout remains readable and coherent; no overflow or clipping regressions at common mobile widths.

title: Homepage: remove feature card trio
description: Remove the three-card feature section under the hero. Use only the lower panels to communicate features.

title: Increase readability contrast and helper text legibility in dashboard forms
description: Small helper text placeholders and low contrast labels reduce form usability. Adjust typography and contrast tokens for better readability while preserving design style.
acceptance_criteria: Helper text labels and placeholders are readable across breakpoints; contrast meets accessibility expectations for form support text; no regressions in primary text hierarchy.

title: Optimize mobile map page with explicit map list view toggle
description: Mobile map view pushes important content too far down. Add a clear map and list toggle pattern and reduce initial map dominance to improve task completion speed.
acceptance_criteria: Mobile users can quickly switch between map and list views; default layout reduces excess scrolling; controls remain accessible and state is preserved while switching.

title: Expand event schedule model with end time and timezone
description: Event schedule currently captures only start date and time. Add per-performance end time and event timezone fields to support accurate display sorting and detail pages.
acceptance_criteria: Each performance captures start and end times; timezone is captured at event level or performance level as designed; invalid ranges are prevented with inline validation.

title: Normalize map result count language and semantics
description: Map UI uses mixed count labels like results and total. Standardize count terminology and rules so users can interpret filtered and overall totals without ambiguity.
acceptance_criteria: Count labels are consistent across map and listings modules; filtered and total values are clearly defined; copy remains consistent on mobile and desktop.

title: Implement service detail page with full provider data rendering
description: Implement service detail UI that renders all available service provider fields from current data model. Include service category service area contact details and external links when present.
acceptance_criteria: Service detail route renders complete provider information from source data; optional values are displayed with clear fallback treatment; page remains consistent with brand design.

title: Refactor side promotion cards to reduce unused space and improve value
description: Get listed and submit panels have large dead areas and weak value communication. Tighten layout and messaging so promo cards are compact informative and conversion oriented.
acceptance_criteria: Promo cards use space efficiently on desktop and mobile; value proposition and CTA are clear; layout feels balanced with adjacent directory content.
close_reason: Refactored side promotion cards for compact layout, clearer value copy, and stronger CTA hierarchy.

title: Standardize auth page copy and terminology
description: Auth page copy has consistency and tone issues. Perform a copy pass to normalize wording, remove awkward phrasing, and align CTA language across Sign-In and Create Account.
acceptance_criteria: Sign-In and Create Account use consistent terminology; no obvious grammar/spelling inconsistencies remain; CTA labels and supporting text match intended flows.
close_reason: Standardized sign-in/sign-up/auth CTA and helper copy for consistent terminology.

title: Homepage: add custom icons to lower panels
description: Add custom icons to the lower feature panels (Map, Services, Search) that match the western logo style.

title: Homepage: enlarge feature cards + add badge icons
description: Make the three feature cards (Discovery, Community, Services) larger by increasing padding/spacing and add a small badge icon to each card. Use consistent icon style and Tailwind-only styling.

title: Link listing and map modules to detail pages for events venues and services
description: Update cards rows and map listing items so users can navigate into detail pages from discovery surfaces. Ensure click targets are discoverable and preserve existing actions like favorite and external links.
acceptance_criteria: Events venues and services discovery surfaces link to the correct detail routes; navigation works from list and map contexts; interactive affordances are clear and keyboard accessible.

title: Rebalance hero visual hierarchy across breakpoints
description:
The hero logo currently dominates tablet/mobile and pushes key functional content (quick search) too far down. Redesign hero proportions and spacing so headline + primary action remain the focal point and logo supports, rather than dominates, the layout.

Scope:
- Adjust logo size/placement by breakpoint.
- Keep brand impact while reducing scroll cost before utility content.
- Ensure composition feels intentional on desktop/tablet/mobile.
acceptance_criteria:
- Hero logo no longer overwhelms text/CTA on tablet/mobile.
- Above-the-fold section prioritizes headline + CTA.
- Brand mark remains visible and aesthetically consistent.
- Validate via Chrome DevTools screenshots at desktop/tablet/mobile and confirm zero console errors.

title: Homepage: increase hero subhead font size
description: Increase the font size and readability of the hero subhead paragraph under the main headline on the homepage. Update Tailwind classes in app/page.tsx.

title: Homepage: reduce hero image scale
description: Reduce the hero image size/scale on desktop to give headline more breathing room while keeping the floating, frameless look.

title: Chore: clean folder structure
description: Remove empty or inconsistent folders and align app structure with Next.js best practices (no code behavior changes).

title: Expand map search and filtering with empty state handling
description: Map page currently has minimal search controls. Add richer query and filtering options and define clear no result and no match states so users can recover quickly.
acceptance_criteria: Map supports practical search and filter controls; no result states include clear messaging and reset action; filtered counts and list content update correctly.

title: Evaluate and implement draft save support for long dashboard forms
description: Long form completion benefits from draft persistence. Assess implementation and add draft save or autosave for event and service forms if feasible within current architecture.
acceptance_criteria: Draft capability is available or a documented UX alternative is implemented; users can recover in-progress form data after navigation or refresh; behavior is clearly communicated.
close_reason: Implemented draft-save persistence for long dashboard forms with restore/clear behavior.

title: Header: add mobile hamburger menu
description: Replace stacked nav pills on small screens with a hamburger/menu button that opens a mobile nav drawer/list. Keep Dashboard/Sign In available in the menu.

title: Enhance password field UX on auth forms
description: Password UX is minimal. Add modern affordances including show-hide toggle and clearer requirement guidance; optionally add simple strength feedback aligned with auth rules.
acceptance_criteria: Users can toggle password visibility; password requirements are clear before submit; any strength cue is accurate and non-blocking; controls are keyboard and screen-reader accessible.

title: Address homepage contrast and accessibility gaps
description:
Several dark-theme text/input combinations have low contrast and reduced readability. Perform targeted accessibility fixes on homepage copy, placeholders, labels, and controls.

Scope:
- Improve contrast ratios for body text, labels, placeholders, and button text/states.
- Ensure focus-visible styles are clear and keyboard-friendly.
- Maintain brand palette while meeting accessibility expectations.
acceptance_criteria:
- Text and UI controls meet WCAG contrast guidance for their role.
- Placeholders/labels are clearly legible on dark backgrounds.
- Visible keyboard focus states are present and usable.
- Validate with accessibility checks plus Chrome DevTools screenshots and zero console errors.
close_reason: Implemented contrast/focus/label legibility improvements on homepage and shared controls.

title: Remove unsupported Google auth option from auth pages
description: Google authentication is not offered but the UI still shows a Continue with Google button on Sign-In and Create Account experiences. Remove the unsupported option and related dead-end logic. Scope: remove Google auth button from Sign-In route; remove Google auth button from Create Account route; remove or guard corresponding client handlers and unused copy.
acceptance_criteria: No Google auth button appears anywhere on Sign-In/Create Account screens; auth pages show only supported authentication pathways; no broken links, no dead interactions, and zero console errors.

title: Refactor footer hierarchy and mobile information architecture
description:
Footer stack is long on mobile and key links are buried. Rework footer structure/spacing to improve scannability and hierarchy while retaining required links/content.

Scope:
- Re-prioritize footer section order and spacing for small screens.
- Improve heading/link hierarchy and reduce visual fatigue.
- Keep legal and brand elements clear but compact.
acceptance_criteria:
- Mobile footer is easier to scan with stronger hierarchy.
- Required links remain present and discoverable.
- Footer length and spacing feel more compact without crowding.
- Validate via Chrome DevTools screenshots across breakpoints and zero console errors.

title: Add Forgot Password path to sign-in flow
description: Sign-In UI lacks a clear password recovery path. Add a visible and accessible Forgot password action connected to the reset workflow and keep styling consistent with auth UI.
acceptance_criteria: Sign-In includes a visible Forgot password link; link opens the intended password recovery flow; keyboard and screen-reader users can discover and activate it; validate in DevTools with zero console errors.

title: Improve homepage typographic legibility
description:
Typography currently relies heavily on all-caps and wide tracking in smaller contexts, reducing readability. Tune type scale, line height, and letter spacing for better legibility across breakpoints.

Scope:
- Adjust typographic settings for headings, labels, and support text.
- Preserve brand character while improving scan speed.
- Focus on small-screen readability.
acceptance_criteria:
- Key text blocks are more readable on mobile/tablet.
- Overly aggressive tracking/all-caps usage is reduced where it harms legibility.
- Typography remains consistent with visual identity.
- Validate with side-by-side screenshots and zero console errors.

title: Improve above-the-fold utility on mobile homepage
description:
Mobile hero currently requires too much scrolling before users reach functional content. Re-sequence/compress top-of-page modules so users can reach quick search and core actions sooner.

Scope:
- Reduce pre-content scroll by adjusting hero composition/order/spacing.
- Keep branding present while prioritizing task-oriented content.
- Ensure resulting flow remains coherent with overall design system.
acceptance_criteria:
- Mobile users can access quick search and primary utility with less initial scrolling.
- Hero still communicates brand and value proposition.
- No regression in desktop/tablet composition.
- Validate via Chrome DevTools screenshots/interactions and zero console errors.

title: Add clear click affordances for list items and card titles
description: Some card content appears static even when it should navigate. Add clear affordances for clickable rows or titles and ensure destination cues are obvious.
acceptance_criteria: Clickable elements are visually distinct and discoverable; keyboard focus indicates navigation targets; interaction patterns are consistent across directory modules.

title: Enhance event submission scheduling and metadata
description: Build a custom-styled date/time picker, support multi-day and recurring events with multiple performances, and add disciplines + sanctioning selections; generate recurring instances as individual events.

title: Normalize service category input to controlled taxonomy
description: Service category should not rely on free text lists. Replace with controlled taxonomy selection to improve consistency search and filtering quality.
acceptance_criteria: Service category selection uses controlled options (single or multi select as designed); submitted values are normalized; discovery filters can reliably consume category data.

title: Auto-migrate legacy Supabase auth cookies
description: Rewrite base64-prefixed legacy Supabase auth cookies to JSON so users do not need to clear cookies manually.

title: Expand service profile schema for details page readiness
description: Add missing service profile fields needed for high quality detail pages including contact person email specialties and optional pricing or availability context.
acceptance_criteria: Service form captures additional structured profile fields required by detail pages; optional fields are clearly marked; saved records expose complete detail-ready data.

title: Add venue country + recurrence toggle UI
description: Add country to venue forms/data and change recurrence UI to checkbox with pattern shown only when enabled.

title: Show Dashboard nav item only for authenticated users
description:
Homepage currently surfaces Dashboard prominently for all users. Update navigation rendering logic so Dashboard is shown only when a user is authenticated.

Scope:
- Gate Dashboard nav item behind auth state.
- Ensure unauthenticated users see only public navigation.
- Verify behavior on desktop and collapsed/hamburger nav.
acceptance_criteria:
- Unauthenticated users do not see Dashboard nav link.
- Authenticated users see Dashboard link in all nav variants.
- No nav regression on desktop/tablet/mobile.
- Validate via Chrome DevTools (auth/no-auth scenarios if available) and zero console errors.

title: Clarify event form venue selection and new venue creation flow
description: Redesign the venue input interaction in Add Event so users can clearly choose between selecting an existing venue and creating a new venue inline. Add explicit mode controls and visible state transitions.
acceptance_criteria: Event form has a clear venue mode switch for existing vs new venue; active mode is visually explicit; users can complete either path without ambiguity on desktop and mobile.

title: Homepage: move search card below hero
Homepage: keep hero image floating (no border/glow)
description: Ensure the hero image on the homepage remains floating with no border or glow. Keep the wrapper transparent and avoid card framing.

title: Implement submission feedback states for event and service forms
description: Add clear submit lifecycle states to prevent confusion on long forms. Include loading success and failure patterns and disable duplicate submits while pending.
acceptance_criteria: Submit buttons show loading state during request; duplicate submits are prevented; success and failure feedback is visible and actionable; no silent failures occur.

title: Clarify secondary auth card intent on sign-in and sign-up
description: Secondary auth card messaging is mixed and potentially confusing. Refactor so each page has one clear secondary action: Sign-In promotes Create Account; Create Account promotes Back to Sign In.
acceptance_criteria: Secondary card content is unambiguous on both pages; each page presents one clear primary and one clear secondary route; CTA labels and destinations match page intent.

title: Fix legacy Supabase auth cookie parsing
description: Decode legacy base64-prefixed Supabase auth cookies so auth-js can parse sessions instead of treating them as strings.

title: Sprint 3 events and venues data flows
description: Add server-side data access and actions for venues/events CRUD (user submissions + public approved reads), aligned to schema.
notes: Added server-side events/venues data layer with validation, geocoding, user/admin guards, status transitions, and helper result types. npm run build passes.

title: Footer: redesign with modern layout
description: Redesign the footer to feel cleaner and more modern while keeping the same link set. Adjust spacing, hierarchy, and typography.

title: Map marker visibility and popup accessibility
description: Improve venue marker visibility (bright red), fix map popup close button layout, and resolve aria warnings on popovers.

title: Header: add active state for nav pills
description: Add an active state styling to header nav pills based on current route (e.g., brighter border/text, subtle glow) so users know their location.

title: Header: reorder nav with dashboard first
Create compact auth page shell for reduced friction
description: Auth routes currently inherit heavy marketing chrome that distracts from completion. Introduce a compact auth shell treatment while retaining required links and legal access.
acceptance_criteria: Auth routes present a lighter layout focused on sign-in and sign-up tasks; required legal/navigation elements remain available; mobile and desktop both show improved task focus.

title: Implement full recurrence rule configuration in event form
description: Recurring checkbox alone is insufficient. Add recurrence rule controls including frequency interval and end condition so recurring events can be represented correctly.
acceptance_criteria: Recurring events support structured rule inputs (frequency interval and end condition/date/count); rule UI is shown only when recurrence is enabled; submitted data can be expanded deterministically.

title: Add loading empty error and not found states for detail routes
description: Implement robust async and failure states for all detail pages so users receive clear feedback when data is loading unavailable or invalid.
acceptance_criteria: Each detail route has loading and not found handling; error state messaging is user friendly and consistent with site style; invalid IDs do not cause unhandled crashes.

title: Sprint 2 auth & roles completion
description: Finish Sprint 2 auth + roles work: verify signup/login flows (email + Google), profile creation, role guard behavior, and dashboard access. Ensure RLS policies align and UI validation passes.

title: Add keyboard navigation to venue autocomplete
description: Enable arrow/enter navigation for venue typeahead and make input full width.

title: Restore or replace missing discipline and sanctioning selector configuration
description: Event form shows no disciplines configured and no sanctioning bodies configured. Ensure selectors are populated or provide a graceful fallback path that does not block legitimate submissions.
acceptance_criteria: Discipline and sanctioning controls load valid options when available; graceful fallback exists when options are unavailable; users are not left in a dead end state.

title: Allow custom recurrence dates with shared schedule
description: Allow multiple custom recurrence start dates and apply the full base performance schedule to each recurrence.

title: Implement consistent interaction states for key actions
description: Core action controls need consistent hover focus active disabled and loading states. Define and apply unified interaction states for favorite submit and external link actions.
acceptance_criteria: Key action buttons and links share a consistent state model; focus and hover feedback are obvious; loading and disabled states prevent double actions and confusion.

title: Replace Event Search feature card with Browse All Events card
description: Homepage already has quick search, so replace the duplicate Event Search card with a Browse All Events card for exploratory discovery. Update card copy, icon treatment if needed, and CTA destination to the all-events listing.
acceptance_criteria: Feature card communicates Browse All Events intent; CTA routes to all-events listing; style remains consistent with other cards; validate link behavior in Chrome DevTools and confirm zero console errors.

title: Fix broken sign-out action in avatar dropdown
description:
The Sign Out control in the avatar dropdown does not log the user out. Diagnose and fix the sign-out flow so the control reliably terminates the session.

Scope:
- Wire dropdown Sign Out to the correct auth sign-out call.
- Handle async errors and surface user feedback when sign-out fails.
- Ensure dropdown closes and UI updates after successful sign-out.
- Verify route behavior after sign-out (redirect or public state as designed).
acceptance_criteria:
- Clicking Sign Out successfully ends the authenticated session.
- Authenticated-only nav/account UI is removed after sign-out.
- Failures show actionable feedback instead of silent no-op.
- Validate in Chrome DevTools with interaction test and zero console errors.

title: Implement event detail page with full event data rendering
description: Implement event detail UI that renders all available event fields from current data model. Include essential metadata sections such as title schedule location description and participation context where available.
acceptance_criteria: Event detail route renders complete event information from source data; missing optional fields are handled gracefully; layout matches site design language on desktop and mobile.

title: Switch tablet navigation to hamburger menu
description:
Top navigation remains in desktop pill layout too long and becomes cramped on tablet. Update responsive nav breakpoints so tablet uses the mobile/hamburger pattern.

Scope:
- Define and implement breakpoint where nav transitions to collapsed menu.
- Ensure menu interactions are touch-friendly and accessible.
- Preserve desktop nav behavior on large screens.
acceptance_criteria:
- Tablet viewport shows hamburger/collapsed nav instead of cramped desktop pills.
- Menu opens/closes reliably and supports keyboard navigation.
- Desktop and mobile nav behaviors remain correct.
- Validate via Chrome DevTools interaction testing and zero console errors.

title: Footer: add nav + about/contact/privacy/terms links
description: Add a footer with navigation links duplicating the header (Events, Venues, Services, Dashboard or Sign In) plus About, Contact, Privacy Policy, and Terms of Service links. Match header styling; links can point to placeholder routes.

title: Homepage: convert lower panel CTAs to pill buttons
description: Turn lower panel links (Map/Services/Search) into pill-style buttons consistent with header, and ensure each card links to its relevant page.

title: Sprint 3 events and venues UI flows
description: Add dashboard pages and server actions for event + venue submission and listing, wired to Sprint 3 data layer.
notes: Added dashboard venues/events pages with create forms, status lists, and server actions. Build passes. Chrome DevTools UI validation still required per AGENTS.md.

title: Tune typography for scanability in metadata and utility text
description: Heavy tracking and all caps usage reduce reading speed in utility areas. Refine letter spacing casing and type scale for metadata labels buttons and small text.
acceptance_criteria: Utility text is easier to scan on mobile and desktop; typography remains stylistically consistent; no hierarchy confusion introduced.
close_reason: Adjusted utility/meta typography tracking/contrast for better scanability across listing/detail screens.

title: Homepage: tighten hero copy
description: Shorten the homepage hero headline and supporting paragraph to be more concise while keeping the same meaning (find events, venues, services). Update copy in app/page.tsx hero section and keep the brand tone.

title: Add field level and cross field validation rules for forms data quality
description: Implement robust validation for phone zip date time and cross field relationships such as end after start and recurrence constraints.
acceptance_criteria: Field-level validation catches malformed values; cross-field rules prevent inconsistent schedules; error messages explain how to fix issues before submission.

title: Add auth middleware and route guards
description: Protect /dashboard and /admin, redirect auth routes when signed in, and keep Supabase SSR session cookies in middleware.
notes: Added middleware auth guards for /dashboard and /admin, redirects for signed-in users on auth routes, and preserves Supabase SSR cookies. npm run build passes.

title: Reduce repeated unauthenticated favorite prompts in listing cards
description: The sign in to favorite prompt repeats on every item and adds noise. Replace with a lighter gating pattern such as one global prompt or less intrusive per card treatment.
acceptance_criteria: Unauthenticated state communicates favorite requirement without repeated visual clutter; users still understand how to sign in to favorite items; card scanability improves on desktop and mobile.

title: Add URL format guidance and validation for website and flyer inputs
description: Website and flyer fields need clear format expectations and validation. Add helper guidance and URL normalization checks.
acceptance_criteria: URL fields include clear input guidance; invalid URL formats are flagged inline; accepted URLs are normalized consistently.
close_reason: Added URL guidance and client/server validation for flyer and website fields.

title: Add venue autocomplete + new venue inline creation
description: Replace venue select with typeahead autocomplete showing name/address and add-new option; allow inline venue creation and polish date/time picker styles.

title: Improve tablet layout on homepage
description: Tablet: reduce hero image size, shrink headline to first line on smaller devices, improve quick search layout and card sizing consistency.

title: Standardize spacing rhythm across cards sections and page modules
description: Vertical and internal spacing differs noticeably between core pages. Normalize spacing tokens and section rhythm to create a coherent experience across Events Venues Services and Map.
acceptance_criteria: Section gaps and card paddings follow a consistent spacing system; pages feel visually aligned across routes and breakpoints; no crowding or excessive whitespace remains.
close_reason: Standardized vertical spacing rhythm across events/venues/services/map page headers, card grids, and side modules.

title: Events: implement distance filtering
description: Geocode the location input (Mapbox or existing provider) and filter events by radius using Supabase/PostGIS. Update data query and results list accordingly.

title: Homepage polish: CTAs, spacing, footer tweaks
description: Smaller improvements: tighten CTA spacing, adjust footer typography/spacing, align with updated homepage styling.

title: Run responsive and accessibility pass for new detail pages
description: Audit and fix responsive layout and accessibility behavior across all new detail pages. Validate typography contrast focus order semantics and keyboard interaction.
acceptance_criteria: Detail pages are usable across mobile tablet and desktop; key accessibility requirements are met including readable contrast and visible focus states; Chrome DevTools validation passes without console errors.
close_reason: Completed responsive and accessibility pass for event/venue/service detail pages and states.

title: Improve mobile form completion flow and post submit confirmation experience
description: Forms are long on mobile and confirmation is weak. Improve section spacing and completion guidance and ensure users can quickly confirm submission outcome and next steps.
acceptance_criteria: Mobile form completion requires less disorienting scrolling; users receive clear confirmation after submit; key next actions are visible without excessive scroll.

title: Redesign feature card grid for tablet balance
description:
The current tablet card layout leaves an orphan card and large negative space. Implement a better responsive grid strategy for the feature cards to maintain visual balance and scanning flow.

Scope:
- Propose and implement a tablet layout that avoids awkward 2+1 orphan composition.
- Keep card hierarchy clear and consistent with existing design language.
- Ensure layout degrades gracefully on mobile and scales on desktop.
acceptance_criteria:
- Tablet card section has balanced composition with no awkward orphan layout.
- Card spacing, alignment, and heights feel intentional.
- Mobile and desktop layouts remain usable and visually coherent.
- Validate via Chrome DevTools screenshots and confirm zero console errors.

title: Normalize homepage spacing rhythm across sections
description:
Vertical rhythm is inconsistent between hero, quick search, feature cards, and footer. Standardize spacing tokens and section gaps for cleaner visual flow.

Scope:
- Audit spacing values across homepage sections.
- Consolidate to consistent spacing scale per breakpoint.
- Avoid introducing unnecessary complexity; keep changes incremental.
acceptance_criteria:
- Section spacing feels consistent and intentional on all breakpoints.
- No abrupt or awkward whitespace jumps between modules.
- Existing layout integrity is preserved.
- Validate via Chrome DevTools screenshots and zero console errors.

title: Header: unify nav link styling + increase font size
description: Make all header navigation links match the Dashboard pill style and slightly increase font size. Adjust header height/padding if needed for balance.

title: Unify CTA hierarchy and labels across events venues services and map
description: Current page hero CTAs are inconsistent and can point to unrelated actions. Redesign CTA hierarchy and button copy so each page has one clear primary action and consistent secondary actions.
acceptance_criteria: Each page has clear primary CTA tied to page intent; cross navigation CTAs are consistent and predictable; CTA labels and destinations match route purpose.

title: Convert event classes and divisions into structured inputs
description: Classes and divisions are currently freeform text. Replace with structured repeatable inputs or tokenized controls to improve data quality and downstream filtering.
acceptance_criteria: Classes and divisions are captured in structured format; validation prevents malformed entries; resulting data is usable for filtering and detail display.

title: Optimize desktop auth form width and reading measure
description: Desktop auth forms are very wide, reducing scanning comfort. Constrain container width and tune spacing for better readable measure while preserving responsive behavior.
acceptance_criteria: Desktop auth forms have improved readable line length; inputs and labels remain aligned; no regressions at tablet or mobile breakpoints.

title: Improve event card information architecture and decision metadata
description: Event cards do not provide enough decision support details. Add high value metadata and improve hierarchy for faster comparison such as category distance status and relevant quick attributes.
acceptance_criteria: Event cards expose key metadata consistently; users can compare events without opening each detail page; mobile and desktop layouts remain readable.

title: Add required venue name and core fields to inline new venue section
description: The inline new venue section needs complete minimum venue data capture. Add required Venue name and ensure required address fields are enforced for venue creation.
acceptance_criteria: Inline venue creation includes required venue name plus required location fields; submission is blocked with clear errors when required venue fields are missing; created venue data is complete enough for listing and detail page use.

title: Fix mobile hero headline truncation bug
description: Homepage hero heading is truncated on mobile (missing 'and western events'). Fix responsive typography/layout so full heading renders consistently without clipping or overflow across breakpoints.
acceptance_criteria: Mobile hero headline displays full intended copy with no truncation; no clipping at 320/375/414/768/1024+; desktop/tablet layout remains consistent; validate with Chrome DevTools snapshots/screenshots and zero console errors.

title: Tests: add unit + integration coverage
description: Add unit tests for pages/components/services and integration tests for core visitor flows; ensure all tests pass.

title: Adjust map popup title padding
description: Add extra top padding in Mapbox popup so title aligns with the close button.

title: Accessibility: increase small text size and brightness
description: Audit homepage and footer for low-contrast or tiny text; slightly increase font sizes and brighten text color where needed while preserving the brand palette.

title: Standardize listing card action placement across breakpoints
description: Card actions appear in inconsistent positions and interrupt reading flow on mobile. Move actions to a consistent region of each card and preserve a stable pattern across pages.
acceptance_criteria: Primary and secondary card actions appear in predictable positions on all breakpoints; content scanning order is improved; no overlap or clipping occurs.

title: Require at least one contact method for service submissions
description: Service forms should not allow listings with no contact path. Enforce at least one required contact channel and provide clear validation copy.
acceptance_criteria: Service submission requires at least one valid contact channel (phone email website or configured minimum); users see clear validation if none is provided.

title: Improve quick search form layout and usability on tablet/mobile
description:
The quick search row becomes cramped at smaller breakpoints. Refactor the responsive form structure so location input, radius selector, and CTA are easy to scan and interact with.

Scope:
- Rework field stacking/order/sizing at tablet and mobile.
- Preserve clear label-to-input association and touch-friendly controls.
- Keep submit flow obvious and reduce visual crowding.
acceptance_criteria:
- Quick search controls are readable and comfortably usable on tablet/mobile.
- No cramped horizontal compression of fields/CTA on tablet.
- Form remains fully functional and visually clean across breakpoints.
- Validate via Chrome DevTools interaction testing (fill/select/click), screenshots, and zero console errors.

title: Add consistent required indicators and inline validation across event and service forms
description: Both forms need explicit required field indicators and immediate validation feedback. Standardize required markers and per-field validation behavior.
acceptance_criteria: Required fields are clearly marked; invalid values show inline error messages; error states are consistent across event and service forms; keyboard and screen reader users receive equivalent feedback.

title: Add stable multi performance controls for add remove and reorder
description: Performance schedule needs robust item management when multiple performances are added. Provide controls for adding removing and reordering performance blocks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can add remove and reorder performance entries; order is preserved in submitted payload; UI handles multiple entries without layout breakage.

title: Homepage: normalize heading casing
description: Choose a consistent heading casing (sentence case or title case) across hero and lower panels and apply site-wide for a refined look.

title: Homepage: remove beta pill
description: Remove the 'North America - Beta access' pill under the header in the hero section so the hero starts directly with the headline.

title: Build reusable detail media component with image fallback support
description: Create a reusable media block for detail pages that shows the primary image when available and a branded fallback when no image is provided. Include responsive behavior and safe defaults for missing metadata.
acceptance_criteria: Detail pages display provided image when available; fallback visual appears when image is missing; no broken image icons appear; media section is responsive and accessible.

title: Improve active navigation state on auth routes
description: Current auth-route navigation does not strongly indicate location. Improve active state affordance and avoid misleading redundant current-route actions.
acceptance_criteria: Active route state is clearly visible on auth pages; users can quickly identify current location in navigation; no regressions in desktop or mobile nav variants.

title: Add service image or logo input with preview and fallback
description: Service profiles need media support for better listing and detail presentation. Add image or logo input with preview and fallback handling for missing assets.
acceptance_criteria: Service form supports image/logo input and preview; stored media renders in listing/detail surfaces; fallback image treatment appears when no media is provided.

title: Header: add location search bar
description: Add a location search bar just below the header with an input (City/State/ZIP), radius dropdown, and Search button. Style to match the brand and ensure responsive layout.

title: Refactor event form into clear sections with progressive structure
description: Event form is complex and needs stronger information architecture. Group fields into logical sections with clear headings and consistent spacing to reduce cognitive load.
acceptance_criteria: Event form is organized into clear sections (core info venue schedule classification media and review); section boundaries are obvious; users can scan and complete the form faster.

title: Header: replace beta pill with user avatar/sign-in menu
description: Replace the header Beta pill with auth-aware UI: if signed in, show a circular avatar with the first initial (from profile name or email) and open a dropdown menu on click with Sign out. If signed out, show a Sign In button. Implement in app/layout.tsx using existing Supabase user data and signOut action with styling consistent to the header.

title: Harden accessibility semantics on auth forms
description: Perform a semantic accessibility pass on auth forms: verify label associations, autocomplete attributes, focus order, keyboard submission, and aria-live behavior for async errors.
acceptance_criteria: Inputs expose correct labels and autocomplete metadata; keyboard-only users can complete auth flows end-to-end; async errors are announced appropriately to assistive tech.
close_reason: Hardened auth form semantics with explicit error associations, alert/status regions, and improved control ARIA metadata.

title: Sprint 1 foundation setup
description: Sprint 1 foundation: Next.js + Tailwind baseline, app shell, Supabase and Mapbox config, env conventions, and initial structure.
notes: Sprint 2 auth + roles scaffolded: sign-in/sign-up pages, server actions, OAuth callback route, dashboard route guard, Supabase profile helper. Added .gitignore/.prettierignore. npm run build passes.

title: Create compact footer variant for internal directory and map pages
description: Long marketing footer on deep workflow pages adds unnecessary scroll on mobile. Introduce a compact internal footer variant while preserving required links.
acceptance_criteria: Internal pages use a shorter footer with required legal and nav links; mobile scroll length is reduced; visual style remains consistent with brand.
close_reason: Added compact footer variant for internal directory/map/dashboard contexts via SiteFooter routing-aware behavior.

title: Homepage: add search events feature panel
description: Add a third lower panel card to highlight event search/discovery, aligned with Map Preview and Service Network cards.

title: Create detail page route architecture for events venues and services
description: Define and implement App Router detail route structure for core entities using stable IDs or slugs. Establish a shared layout pattern so detail pages are visually consistent with existing site sections.
acceptance_criteria: Routes exist for event detail venue detail and service detail; route params are stable and documented; pages use a shared design shell aligned with current brand style.

title: Homepage: remove submit event CTA
description: Remove the Submit an Event CTA from the homepage entirely. In app/page.tsx hero buttons, keep only the Explore Events button and do not add any submit CTA on the homepage.

title: Homepage: increase card contrast
description: Increase contrast of homepage cards (feature cards and lower panels) so they stand out from the background. Adjust border/background/brightness via Tailwind.

title: Improve contrast and readability on auth form surfaces
description: Input placeholders, small labels, and microcopy on dark auth surfaces have weak contrast. Improve readability while preserving brand style and state clarity.
acceptance_criteria: Auth page text and inputs meet accessibility contrast expectations; placeholders and micro-labels are clearly readable; focused and disabled states remain legible.

title: Improve map legend and marker accessibility beyond color alone
description: Map legend and markers rely heavily on color distinction. Add non color cues and stronger differentiation for event and venue types to improve accessibility.
acceptance_criteria: Legend and marker type differences are understandable without relying only on color; contrast and iconography meet accessibility expectations; mobile and desktop parity is maintained.

title: Sprint 4 services & favorites
description: Implement services directory CRUD, approvals, and public listings; add favorites (events/services) for authenticated users with UI + server actions; validate flows in Chrome DevTools.
